# stackedItemPositioning

**Instance Property**

The scheme to use when positioning stacked items within the tab bar.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var stackedItemPositioning: UITabBar.ItemPositioning { get set }
```

## Discussion

Use this property to specify whether you want the items centered in the available space or distributed across the entire width of the tab bar.

## Configuring stacked item appearances

- **stackedLayoutAppearance**: The appearance attributes for items with a stacked layout.
- **stackedItemSpacing**: The amount of space to insert between stacked tab bar items.
- **stackedItemWidth**: The width of stacked items in the tab bar.
